analysis.description:
Reclaimable.reclaim (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#1627-1636) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- reclaimer.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#1634-1635)

BasicSnapshotToken._balances (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#2431-2432) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- mTransfer (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#2644-2680)
	- allBalancesOf (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#2573-2590)
	- balanceOfAtInternal (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#2609-2630)
	- mGenerateTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#2726-2737)
	- mDestroyTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#2742-2771)
IdentityRecord.deserializeClaims (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#1261-1268) is declared view but contains assembly code
IsContract.isContract (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#1400-1403) is declared view but contains assembly code
NeumarkIssuanceCurve.cumulative (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#1484-1520) is declared view but contains assembly code

Agreement.acceptAgreementInternal (/unique_chucks/47/0x1a637dac5effb60fb4fd4a808fb24914d56d4046.sol#495-503) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _signatories[accepter] == 0
